name: Minion Masters: Outlandish Operations
summary:
Outlandish Operations is the Faction Box for starting or expanding your Outlander faction collection. This is a great +300% value bundle of Outlander cards and Master, including the outlaw Settsu (Master), and get a headstart in this month’s Season Pass!

Includes:
- Settsu (Master)
- Infested Settsu Skin (Legendary Master Skin)
- 5x Infiltration (Supreme)
- 20x A.I.M Bot
- 40x Beam Of Doom
- 40x S.T.INT
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 3x Season Pass Tiers

The high-tech Outlanders employ ranged minions and a formidable air force to outmaneuver their enemies. Build up your Outlander Tech by playing Outlander cards, which empowers certain Outlander machines to make a strong push, then finish off your opponent by dropping off marines behind enemy lines with Infiltration, and combine it with Settsu’s Blast Entry for an extra devastating finish.
With this Faction Box, you have the perfect kit to become an Outlander Prime!
